io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom

Interface ByteArrayReseedableRandom

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AesCounterRandom, BaseRandom, BaseSplittableRandomAdapter, CellularAutomatonRandom, Cmwc4096Random, DirectSplittableRandomAdapter, MersenneTwisterRandom, RandomWrapper, ReseedingSplittableRandomAdapter, SingleThreadSplittableRandomAdapter, SplittableRandomAdapter, XorShiftRandom

    public interface ByteArrayReseedableRandom
    A Random that can be reseeded using a byte array instead of using Random.setSeed(long) (although that may also be supported).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getNewSeedLength() 
      default boolean preferSeedWithLong() 
      void setSeed(byte[] seed)
      Reseed this PRNG.

    • Method Detail

      • setSeed

        void setSeed(byte[] seed)
        Reseed this PRNG.
        Parameters:
        seed - The PRNG's new seed.

      • getNewSeedLength

        int getNewSeedLength()
        Returns:
        The supported length of a new byte-array seed, or the optimal length if multiple lengths are supported.

      • preferSeedWithLong

        default boolean preferSeedWithLong()
        Returns:
        Whether we prefer to have Random.setSeed(long) called instead.
